Quadrature Encoder Interface (QEI)
#include <stdint.h>
#include <dev/qei.h>
#include "periph.h"

Functions

int qei_close (port_t port)
 Close the external interrupt.

 Set the attributes for the external interrupt.

int qei_get (port_t port)
 Get the current position of the encoder.
 
int qei_getvelocity (port_t port)
 Get the current velocity of the encoder.
 
int qei_getindex (port_t port)
 Get the current index count.
